import React,{useState} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Home = props => { const[cart, setCart]=useState([]); const[page, setPage]=useState([]); const addToCart=(id)=>{ const check=props.products.every(ga=>{ return ga.id !==id; }) const data=props.products.filter(pr=>{ return pr.id===id; }) setCart([...cart,...data]); console.log(cart); console.log(check); } return (
